fields.headline: Corrections and clarifications
fields.bodyText: • Figures showing that attendance at cathedral services has risen 14% in a decade related only to Church of England cathedrals, not the whole of Britain as an article implied (Cathedrals are back! These are the finest, 27 November, page 2, G2). • Other recently corrected articles include: Johnson accused of racial stereotyping with view on Nigerians Rescue effort resumes for 14,000 sheep on sinking ship as noises heard inside Tommy review – Ken Russell’s mad rock opera pinballs back into cinemas Conservative party manifesto: what it says and what it means
